title: Public Web Builder
subtitle: Customize how your customers see you online without knowing how to code.
not_available_message: This Landing Page module is only available for Retailer / Supermarket buildings.
toast_link_copied_desc: You can now share it with your customers.
hero_title_placeholder: e.g., Your fresh market at your doorstep
hero_subtitle_placeholder: Briefly describe your service and quality...
marketing_desc: Soon you will be able to see and download the list of customer emails who signed up for your newsletter from the public web.
toast_save_success_desc: Changes are now visible on your public web.
store_hero_subtitle_fallback: Fruits, vegetables, groceries, and premium selected products. Order easily and receive in minutes.
store_benefit_fresh_desc: We select the best freshly harvested products daily.
store_benefit_delivery_desc: Receive your order in 90 minutes or schedule your preferred time.
store_benefit_prices_desc: We eliminate middlemen. Market prices direct to your door.
store_benefit_support_desc: Any questions? Our team is always available to help you.
store_testi1_text: Incredible freshness of the vegetables. They arrived in 45 minutes and everything was perfectly selected. My family noticed the difference.
store_testi2_text: As a restaurant owner, I need constant quality. Supermercado Fresco has never failed me. The customer service is exceptional.
store_testi3_text: The app is super easy to use. I can order from work and I get home right when the products arrive. Great!
store_cta_desc: Join thousands of families already enjoying fresh products without leaving home. Your first order has free shipping.
store_footer_desc: Connecting the field to your table. Fresh, high-quality products delivered straight to your door.
store_footer_newsletter_desc: Receive exclusive offers and weekly news.
